trans-unit.source: There are several tools and utilities that you might want to use as you begin to work with <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.

seg-source.mrk: There are several tools and utilities that you might want to use as you begin to work with <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.

target.mrk: There are several tools and utilities that you might want to use as you begin to work with <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph>.

trans-unit.source: The tools that are included with <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> are <codeph>dblook</codeph>, <codeph>ij</codeph>, and <codeph>sysinfo</codeph>. <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> includes a set of scripts that you can use to start the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> tools. The scripts are located in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productinstallpath"></ph><filepath>/bin</filepath> directory. These scripts also help you set up your classpath.

seg-source.mrk: The tools that are included with <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> are <codeph>dblook</codeph>, <codeph>ij</codeph>, and <codeph>sysinfo</codeph>.
<ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> includes a set of scripts that you can use to start the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> tools.
The scripts are located in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productinstallpath"></ph><filepath>/bin</filepath> directory.
These scripts also help you set up your classpath.

target.mrk: The tools that are included with <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> are <codeph>dblook</codeph>, <codeph>ij</codeph>, and <codeph>sysinfo</codeph>.
<ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> includes a set of scripts that you can use to start the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> tools.
The scripts are located in the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productinstallpath"></ph><filepath>/bin</filepath> directory.
These scripts also help you set up your classpath.

trans-unit.source: To show how to use the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> scripts to launch the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> tools, most of the examples in this guide assume that you are using the embedded mode of the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> database engine.

seg-source.mrk: To show how to use the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> scripts to launch the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> tools, most of the examples in this guide assume that you are using the embedded mode of the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> database engine.

target.mrk: To show how to use the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> scripts to launch the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> tools, most of the examples in this guide assume that you are using the embedded mode of the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> database engine.

trans-unit.source: Running the scripts with the Network Server

seg-source.mrk: Running the scripts with the Network Server

target.mrk: Running the scripts with the Network Server

trans-unit.source: The scripts are designed to run in embedded mode. To run these tools with the Network Server, use the following commands:

seg-source.mrk: The scripts are designed to run in embedded mode.
To run these tools with the Network Server, use the following commands:

target.mrk: The scripts are designed to run in embedded mode.
To run these tools with the Network Server, use the following commands:

trans-unit.source: For the <codeph>dblook</codeph> tool, call the script and specify the <codeph>-d</codeph> option and the full URL to the Network Server database. For example:

trans-unit.source: In addition, there are <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> utilities that are system procedures that you can call by using the <cmdname>ij</cmdname> tool. For example, there are system procedures that you can use to import and export external files. Instructions on how to use these system procedures are included in the <cite><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citutilities"></ph></cite> and the <cite><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citref"></ph></cite>.

seg-source.mrk: In addition, there are <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> utilities that are system procedures that you can call by using the <cmdname>ij</cmdname> tool.
For example, there are system procedures that you can use to import and export external files.

Instructions on how to use these system procedures are included in the <cite><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citutilities"></ph></cite> and the <cite><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citref"></ph></cite>.

target.mrk: In addition, there are <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> utilities that are system procedures that you can call by using the <cmdname>ij</cmdname> tool.
For example, there are system procedures that you can use to import and export external files.

Instructions on how to use these system procedures are included in the <cite><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citutilities"></ph></cite> and the <cite><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citref"></ph></cite>.
